title: [管理][传送]Stargate——Sponge端使用的传送门插件[1.1x]
author: syz123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 syz123 于 2019-2-2 16:18 编辑 

专为Sponge端打造的传送门插件


还在为ProjectPortal不支持API6而烦恼？
那就试试StarGate！
最新的更新已经支持API7了！

插件特点：
1.只有两个指令——一个用于获取插件帮助，一个用于重新加载传送门
2.轻量化插件
3.可以与经济类插件联动
4.多种形式的传送门
5.支持多种语言（除了中文-_-||）
原贴内容
Stargate has only two commands, and they’re for plugin info or reloading. The idea is to aid immersion by making the portal system completely commandless.
Stargate is lightweight. Not only do portals take up a miniscule amount of memory, but all portal updates are throttled, and may be split over multiple ticks if necessary.
Stargate can optionally integrate with the server’s economy in order to provide prices for creating, using, and breaking portals.
Portals can be created in many different styles. You can use the traditional dialer, you can lock it to one location, or you can keep it always on. You can make it backwards, you can hide it from the dialers, you can make it private to only you. You can even hide the network name from the sign, or make the destination random!
Portals can also be created in many different layouts. ** shipped with the plugin is the traditional ‘nether portal’ layout, but you can absolutely make your own! Scissors and glue not included.
Stargate has multi-language support. It ships with some popular languages like French and Spanish, and you can easily add your own.
Compatibility! Stargate will import your old portal db and lang files. Although unfortunately we can’t import your old .gate files, since they use numeric IDs and Sponge simply doesn’t support them.


指令：
/stargate reload 重新加载插件/stargate about 插件信息

权限：
stargate.use: 激活 stargate.world 和 stargate.network. 
stargate.world.worldname: 允许任何门都能传送到 worldname. 
stargate.network.networkname: 允许任何门都能传送到 networkname. 
stargate.option.[hidden|alwayson|private|free|backwards|show|nonetwork]: 允许使用相关的选项 
stargate.create.personal: 使stargate.network.username 和 stargate.create.network.username 能使用（ username 是玩家ID） stargate.create.network.networkname:允许建造一个连接到 networkname.的传送门 
stargate.create.gate.gatename: 允许建造一个名为 gatename.gate.的传送门 
stargate.destroy.personal: 使 stargate.destroy.network.username 能使用（ username 是玩家ID） 
stargate.destroy.network.networkname: 允许在这个网络上摧毁一个传送门networkname. 
stargate.free.use:允许免费使用传送门，不论你如何设置 
stargate.free.create: 允许免费创造传送门，不论你如何设置 
stargate.free.destroy: 允许免费摧毁传送门，不论你如何设置 
stargate.admin.private: 允许使用任何私人的传送门 
stargate.admin.hidden: 允许连接到任何隐藏的传送门 
stargate.admin.reload: 允许重新读取插件
  
如何建造一个传送门？

首先，你需要搭建一个框架。可以是一个标准的地狱传送门的样式。
比如

其次，你需要在两边的当中的方块上，放上一个告示牌。告示牌将用来描述传送门。
                         告示牌上要这么写：
                                   第一行：传送门的名字（不能重复！！！最多使用11个字符）
                                   第二行：传送门的目的地
                                   第三行：传送门网络（默认是在central这个网络中）
                                   第四行：传送门选项（见下文）




file_1549086474000.jpg (102.29 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-2-2 13:47 上传






传送门选项：
A: 一直开启.需要第二行被设置好.一直开启的传送门没有按钮. 
H: 隐藏，不能被其他门所链接，不能被创造者以外的人访问
P: 私人，和隐藏门相反——他可以被其他门链接，但是不能被创造者以外的人访问
F: 免费，如果你有经济插件, 一个免费门可以被免费使用
B: Backwards. A backwards gate exits from the back.（不知道该咋翻译）
S: Shown. If Always-on is enabled, this shows it in dialers anyway.（不知道该咋翻译）
N: 网络隐藏. 传送门网络将不会被写在告示牌上.
R: 随机目的地
当你保存好告示牌之后, 传送门设置就完成了.一个按钮将会被生成去激活这个传送门。

配置文件设置
portal-folder - The folder your portal databases are saved in
gate-folder - The folder containing your .gate files
default-gate-network - The default gate network
destroyexplosion - Whether to destroy a stargate with explosions, or stop an explosion if it contains a gates controls.
useiconomy - Whether or not to enable economy integration. This will get replaced with useeconomy soon.
createcost - The cost to create a stargate
destroycost - The cost to destroy a stargate (Can be negative for a “refund”)
usecost - The cost to use a stargate
chargefreedestination - Enable to allow free travel from any gate to a free gate
**en - Enable to make gates that won’t cost the player money show up as green
toowner - Whether the money from usecost goes to the owner or nobody
maxgates - If non-zero will define the maximum amount of gates allowed in a network.
lang - The language to use (Included languages: en, de, fr, hu, it, nl, pt-br, ru)
ignoreEntrance - Set this option to true to not check the entrance of a gate on startup. Enable this when changing a gates open material.
handleVehicles - Whether or not to handle non-player entities going through gates. If false, they can’t go through.
sortLists - If true, network lists will be sorted alphabetically.
signColor: This allows you to specify the color of the gate signs.
debug - Whether to show a lot of debug output
permdebug - Whether to show an incredible amount of permission debug output复制代码
